## Basic Countdown Timer

5 minutes:

{{< countdown minutes=5 >}}

## Timer with Seconds

2 minutes and 30 seconds:

{{< countdown minutes=2 seconds=30 >}}

## Auto-start Timer

{{< countdown minutes=1 start_immediately=true >}}

## Timer with Warning

Warning state at 30 seconds remaining:

{{< countdown minutes=2 warn_when=30 >}}

## Timer with Sound

{{< countdown minutes=1 play_sound=true >}}

## Styled Timer

{{< countdown minutes=3 font_size=4rem border_radius=20px >}}

## Positioned Timer

{{< countdown minutes=5 top=10px right=10px >}}

## Colored Timer

{{< countdown minutes=2 color_border=blue color_text=white color_background=navy >}}

## Timer with State Colors

{{< countdown minutes=1 color_running_background=green color_warning_background=orange color_finished_background=red >}}

## Brand Colors (from _brand.yml)

Using brand colors (hex values inserted): primary-blue, accent-orange

{{< countdown minutes=2 color_border=#447099 color_background=#EE6331 >}}

## Try Autocomplete

1. Type `{{< countdown ` and press space to see attribute suggestions
2. Type `{{< countdown mi` to filter to `minutes`
3. After `play_sound=`, see `true`/`false` options
4. After `color_border=`, see brand colors (if _brand.yml exists) and CSS colors
5. Attributes are grouped: Timer, Position, Style, Color
